original_title: それいけ!アンパンマン ザ・ベスト みんなだいすき!アンパンマン
overview: From Anpanman TV series, the fourth installment includes three fun episodes of 30 minutes each, part of "The Best" series. Anpanman and his friends enjoy adventures in every episode in a variety of ways!
title: Go! Anpanman: The Best - Everybody likes Anpanman
